TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: Could you maybe edit the main post to keep of log of orders to be done?
Yea, Just need the employees to send me what orders they've done so I can post the ones we have'nt done.
The only one I've fulfilled so far would be that Minmus lander requested by The Creator, which worked fantastically by the way.

i have a bit of a daunting order for you. i would like you to design a craft capable of getting this big guy into kerbin orbit. yup.

mods allowed: mechanical mouse industries kethane pack and satellite pack, mech jeb,and the camera pack ( actually you need to use all of these because the craft has at least one part from all of these mod packs on it ) if you can do this i will be truly impressed. however if it becomes THAT difficult i will install and let you use novapunch, i'm just a little limited on how many mods and can use at a time because my computer sucks. heres the .craft: http://www./download.php?383z7iva4v176mp i wish you good luck, i REALLY do XD

The craft itself looks fairly light, the only problem might be the bulk. NovaPunch is the best way to get something that big into an orbit and I could definitely do that for you. How how of an orbit would you want it though? It help to know so I can add on a proper amount of fuel/thrusters.

The craft itself looks fairly light, the only problem might be the bulk. NovaPunch is the best way to get something that big into an orbit and I could definitely do that for you. How high of an orbit would you want it though? It help to know so I can add on a proper amount of fuel/thrusters.

The craft itself looks fairly light, the only problem might be the bulk. NovaPunch is the best way to get something that big into an orbit and I could definitely do that for you. How high of an orbit would you want it though? It help to know so I can add on a proper amount of fuel/thrusters.

as long as the craft gets into a stable orbit ( not reentering the atmosphere ) it should be fine. 72k would be the ideal.

Edited September 2, 2012 by trollmylove

Alright, good. I can very easily do that for you, possibly even using only stock parts. The only thing is I don't actually have 2 of those mods and don't really want to load up MORE of them seeing as how I have so many. Maybe someone else could tackle it for you.

Alright, good. I can very easily do that for you, possibly even using only stock parts. The only thing is I don't actually have 2 of those mods and don't really want to load up MORE of them seeing as how I have so many. Maybe someone else could tackle it for you.

which 2 do you not have? because none of these packs have any massive amount of parts
Kethane and camera pack are the 2 that I'm missing. My game already takes several minutes to actually load so I'd rather not bog it down even further.
Guys I have a challenge for the employee's Build the largest Starship capable of SOI And planetary exploration, Parts aloud are DYJ Crew Tank, Crewable Empty pods, And Stock.

What does SOI mean again? Oh, and where is the link to Empty Pods?

Edited September 3, 2012 by Hammaneggs
Solar Orbital Insertion I believe, Also look in the Addon, Should be there.
SOI means sphere of influnce
I'd like a really pimped out rocket - like that show "Pimp my Ride". And then, when in orbit, I am going to have Jed ghost ride the rocket and do some wicked Kerbal hyphy.

SOI means sphere of influnce
Whoops my bad, Need to learn a bit more, Learn something new every day, Well it has to be capable of getting to ANY Planet
Can we use MechJeb for EmptyPods to be flyable themselves?
Hmm, Dont know. I think you can fly them if there is a crew member in it.

Kethane and camera pack are the 2 that I'm missing. My game already takes several minutes to actually load so I'd rather not bog it down even further.

yea that's understandable. hopefully i can find someone else who can build the rocket soon.
What mods ya need, Im running Vanilla ATM
I think I need MechJeb for the pods to be controllable.

I managed to land on Minmus after only one rocket design, which I'm very surprised and very pleased with. I made it using only 3 stages as well. It had plenty of fuel left in it when I touched down: 1 full tank of fuel for each rocket, more than enough to make it back to Kerbin. I dubbed this rocket the Mn 1-A Polaris. The only mod I used for the creation of this ship was the NovaPunch Pack. I also made it there without using a MechJeb which I am very proud of. I hope you enjoy your new rocket.

Sadly I did not take any screenshots.

[ATTACH]32337[/ATTACH]

EDIT: It's a bit wobbly but it wont tear itself apart. Feel free to add struts between the 2nd and 3rd stages.

Thanks Farce, the rocket works awesome!

Glad you like it! Keep the orders coming people!

HOLLA!
Since you guys are taking orders again i would like a three man space plane with a mech jeb slapped on there.
Spaceplane as in to get into orbit, or atmospheric?
